content.content: 1. (1) The employer is required under clause 26 (1) (l) of the Act to carry out the training programs necessary to enable a committee member to become a certified member, which must be selected in accordance with the policies and guidelines of the Workplace Safety and Insurance Board.  O. Reg. 780/94, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 20/09, s. 1. (2) In subsection (1), “carry out” includes paying for the training.  O. Reg. 780/94, s. 1 (2).  Français
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The employer is required under clause 26 (1) (l) of the Act to carry out the training programs necessary to enable a committee member to become a certified member, which must be selected in accordance with the policies and guidelines of the Workplace Safety and Insurance Board.  O. Reg. 780/94, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 20/09, s. 1.

(2) In subsection (1),

“carry out” includes paying for the training.  O. Reg. 780/94, s. 1 (2).
